docs.snippet: Australia and New Zealand Banking Group Ltd said on Tuesday it will sell its 20 percent stake in Shanghai Rural Commercial Bank Co Ltd for A$1.8 billion ($1.3 billion), as part of its broader sell-down of Asian assets....
docs.lead_paragraph: Australia and New Zealand Banking Group Ltd said on Tuesday it will sell its 20 percent stake in Shanghai Rural Commercial Bank Co Ltd for A$1.8 billion ($1.3 billion), as part of its broader sell-down of Asian assets.

headline.main: ANZ Sells Shanghai Rural Stake for $1.3 Billion
